backend/main.mo: Defines authorization mixin and comprehensive resident-care data model plus user profile storage and access functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity boot flow, error detection, retry logic, routing, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays ADL records in a table with an optional modal for adding new records.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for adding an ADL record, collecting date, activity, assistance level, and notes before submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with optional custom text and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Error screen shown when bootstrapping fails, offering retry, logout, and expandable error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial user profile setup, allowing entry of name, role, and optional related resident IDs before saving.
Main layout wrapper handling authentication, login screen, header, footer, and rendering child content.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records in a table and provides an option to add new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal for creating a MAR record, letting users select active medications and enter administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Displays active and discontinued medications with edit, add, discontinue, and reactivate actions, using physician data for labeling.
Renders a medications list with status badges and supports adding, editing, and discontinuing medications via modals and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Provides a form modal for creating a new medication, including dosage details, administration settings, and physician assignment.
Modal for editing an existing medication, prefilled with its data and submitting updates through query hooks.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Shows a badge for a resident’s code status, styled differently for DNR versus Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal component for creating a new resident with fields for personal info, physicians, contacts, medications, and related handlers.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s information, prefilled with current data and submitting updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report including personal info, physicians, pharmacy data, and medication lists.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident’s daily vitals in a table and provides an option to open a modal for recording new vitals.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for submitting daily vital sign measurements for a resident using a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, stats, and clinical data through the backend actor with access-control logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes and manages a resilient backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light and dark themes, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Implements user access-control helpers for checking admin/staff permissions and resident accessibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays resident statistics, search/filter tools, and a list of accessible residents with UI for adding new residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Shows detailed resident information with tabs and modals for editing data, managing medications, recording clinical entries, and printing reports.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing recurring boot initialization errors and improving diagnostics and recovery.
